name: Cowboy 3030
storyline: Get ready for a wild ride with Cowboy 3030 - a pulse-pounding third-person roguelite shooter. Transporting you to the futuristic Wild West of 3030, the game puts you in the boots of a plucky bounty hunter. Your mission? Nothing short of monumental - bring down the Nebularos, a gang of extraterrestrial miscreants, as they wreak havoc on your cherished Hololasso County. Are you up for the challenge?
summary: Step into the Wild West future of Cowboy 3030, a third-person roguelite bullet hell where you dive into action-packed shootouts as different playable characters, each with unique abilities and playstyles, to take on notorious outlaws and criminals and rise to become top gun of 3030.
